# addLayoutGuide(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds the provided layout guide to the view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func addLayoutGuide(_ guide: NSLayoutGuide)
```

## Parameters

- **guide**: The layout guide to be added.

## Discussion

This method adds the provided layout guide to the end of the view’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/layoutGuides] array. It also assigns the view to the guide’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSLayoutGuide/owningView] property. Each guide can have only one owning view.

After the guide has been added to a view, it can participate in Auto Layout constraints with that view’s hierarchy.

## Managing Layout Guides

- **removeLayoutGuide(_:)**: Removes the provided layout guide from the view.
- **layoutGuides**: The array of layout guide objects owned by this view.
- **layoutMarginsGuide**: A layout guide that provides the recommended amount of padding for content inside of a view.
